creator: ps@nomensa.com
text:
FYI, its a reported Kupu bug with patch that seems to work
http://codespeak.net/issues/kupu/issue200

Doesn't seem to have been applied to kupu-1.2, offhand cannot remember which
version lenya 1.2.* ships with.

creator: rfrovarp@apache.org
text: Kupu will not be supported in future versions.
